DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to better understand the factors associated with mortality and identify potentially preventable causes of death in neonates who die after receiving health care. As a result, an improved neonatal mortality classification system may be defined.
DOC.brief_title: Factors Associated With Mortality in Neonates
DOC.criteria: Neonates for whom healthcare was provided Born alive Neonate greater than or equal to 22 0/7 weeks estimated gestational age Stillborn Fetal demise Neonates less than or equal to 21 6/7 weeks estimated gestational age
